description: Main entry point and root widget definitions for a Flutter mobile application, including authentication flow, theme setup, routing, and stub pages for login, registration, room listing, booking creation, and loyalty program.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the app, sets up theme and routes, and manages initial authentication flow.

classes.name: _AuthGate
classes.description: Widget that directs to either the rooms list or login page based on authentication status.

classes.name: LoginPage
classes.description: Page for user login, with form validation and authentication handling.

classes.name: RegisterPage
classes.description: Page for user registration, with form validation and registration handling.

classes.name: RoomsListPage
classes.description: Main page displaying list of available rooms, with options for booking and navigation to loyalty and logout.

classes.name: BookingCreatePage
classes.description: Stub page for booking creation process.

classes.name: LoyaltyPage
classes.description: Stub page representing the loyalty program information.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, sets up authentication, and runs the app.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Builds and returns the app's theme data using seed color.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles login form submission, validates inputs, performs authentication, and navigates on success.
